title: Our Products
subtitle: Innovative Dissolvable Hydrogel Wound Dressing with Quercus Infectoria Extract

hero.title: QiSol Hydrogel Film
hero.description: Revolutionary wound dressing film that dissolves into the wound, reducing pain during dressing changes and accelerating healing.

main.title: Superior Features
main.description: QiSol is designed to solve traditional wound care problems, especially for chronic wounds, diabetic ulcers, and pressure sores.

dissolvable.title: Dissolvable
dissolvable.desc: No removal needed, no pain, prevents damage to newly formed tissue.

healing.title: Fast Healing
healing.desc: Stimulates cell regeneration, accelerating healing up to 3 times faster.

antimicrobial.title: Antimicrobial
antimicrobial.desc: Inhibits bacteria and fungi, significantly reducing infection risks.

natural.title: Natural Extract
natural.desc: Infused with Quercus infectoria extract, safe and free from harmful chemicals.

affordable.title: Cost-Effective
affordable.desc: Reduces overall treatment time and medical expenses.

usage.title: How to Use
steps: Clean the wound with saline solution.
Apply QiSol film directly onto the wound.
Cover with gauze or plaster if needed.
The film will gradually dissolve upon contact with wound exudate.

tech.title: Electrospinning Technology
tech.description: Nano-fiber fabrication process creates a highly porous structure allowing gas exchange while blocking bacteria.
